scripts.build-style: sass assets/style/scss/site.scss assets/style/css/site.css && autoprefixer -o assets/style/css/site.prefix.css assets/style/css/site.css
scripts.watch-style: watch 'sass assets/style/scss/site.scss assets/style/css/site.css && autoprefixer -o assets/style/css/site.prefix.css assets/style/css/site.css' assets/style/scss
scripts.build-js: npm run build-js-lib & npm run build-js-src & cat assets/js/dist/lib.js assets/js/dist/src.js > assets/js/dist/site.js
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-style
